amendment.description: To clarify the source of funds allocated under Amendment No. 1171 to H.R. 2360.

action.text: Amendment SA 1221 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 1171.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1221 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1221, previously agreed to, was modified by Unanimous Consent.
